column4: Is anyone available to help with a Java issue in Ubuntu/Linux in general?
I am trying to install an older version of java but not having luck
I just need the runtime for a browser based GUI that doesn't like newer versions of java
I might have found something brb
It doesn't appear that 1.4.0 is installing on my system.  I have followed the directions from Sun.  5.0 installs fine, but I can't get 1.4.0 to.
what's the error and what method did you use
I don't get any errors.  I am using the bin file
everything installs fine but when I go to a site to see what version I am running it says the latest version.  If I remove the latest version and try using just the old version I get nothing.
hmm...so you are trying to install the jre 1.4 and firefox plugin, correct?
yes I am putting a soft link to the plugin in the plugins directory under mozilla
sorry i dont have much experience with java, try looking at the above guide.  it mentions blackdown 1.4 java
